feed.title: Wiredoor Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wiredoor: v1.1.0
entry.content:
New Feature: OAuth2 Proxy Authentication Support

This release introduces built-in support for OAuth2 Proxy, allowing you to secure any service exposed through Wiredoor with authentication via providers like Google, GitHub, Authentik, or any OIDC-compliant service.

Read the Usage Guide to learn more.

entry.title: New release for Wiredoor: v1.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add x_auth headers if certain variables defined by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/31
  • fix: resolve bug removing emails from oauth config by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/34
  • fix: change service_port_unique index by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/36
  • fix: allow update wiredoor service from local node by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/38

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

entry.title: New release for Wiredoor: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add ttl parameter to temporary service exposures using wiredoor cli by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/42
  • Redirect to oauth2 provider by defaultRedirect to oauth2 provider by default by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/43
  • Try to refresh DNS cache making a ping if first resolution intent fails @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/51
  • Await for gateway routing initialization at startup @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/51
  • update multer to fix CVE-2025-48997 by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/52
  • Fix trivial typo - update README.md by @saraf in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/53
  • Escape environment variables by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/58
  • Publish tag version as tags to GHCR by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/58

New Contributors

  • @saraf made their first contribution in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/53

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Wiredoor: v1.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Wiredoor docker image now sopport linux/arm64 arch

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Wiredoor: v1.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhance the validation logic to allow VPN_HOST to be a domain name by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/65
  • Terminate active connection when enable/disable/delete a service by @dmesad in https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/pull/74

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wiredoor/wiredoor/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2
